Html:
Heya

I created a custom talent template that should increase my Ferocious Bite  ( putting points from dps irrelevant talents into Feral Aggression ) damage but instead dps showed decreased value due to the fact that total damage coming from the Bite was listed as zero.

I have then recreated the exact Cat ( 0/54/17 ) tample that Rarw defaults to and the result was the same. Bite damge was at zero again.  Any help would be appreciated.

Obviously, bite damage is zero because Rawr found out it's not optimal to use it.

Whether Rawr's modelling assessment is accurate or not is a separate issue.

You might want to set up a custom rotation with FB. You can then verify that the custom rotation dps varies with Feral Aggression, and that its dps stays always below the standard rotation dps.
